title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Online-Based Mathematics Education Leadership Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics Education Theory and Foundational Digital Tool Application
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design and facilitate team activities for mathematics education projects using online collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet, Zoom breakout rooms).
Learners can create creative digital content (animations, simulations) to explain mathematical concepts in interactive online learning environments.
Learners can improve teaching competencies through peer assessment and self-reflection on PBL-based online mathematics education modules.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
